name: Sanji
text: Activate: Main You may place this card in your trash: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, then place them at the top or bottom of your deck in your preferred order.

effect.text: You may place this card in your trash: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, then place them at the top or bottom of your deck in your preferred order.

meta.notes: Card has 'SAMPLE' watermark, but this is not a game error; it's a placeholder for the card image.
